Bloodystrike smiles, about to reply to Desmonus=

him on top of her, his arm still around her waist. =
After a moment's 
hesitation to relish the feeling of his arm around her, B=
loodystrike 
finally stands up, offering a hand to help her up.

"Sorry abo=
ut that," he says kinda lamely, Reptilica getting up near 
him and looking =
at the two, eager to get into the room and continue 
with what they were go=
ing to do.
